alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Northern Wayne; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued September 09 at 4:01AM EDT until September 09 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In New York, the following counties... Yates, Seneca, Southern Cayuga, Steuben, Schuyler, Chemung, Tompkins, Cortland, Chenango, Otsego, Tioga, Broome and Delaware counties. In Pennsylvania, Bradford, Susquehanna, Northern Wayne and Wyoming counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The worst visibilities, near zero at times, will be found in lower elevations, especially in river valleys. Patchy fog will also affect areas outside the Advisory area, but will generally be less widespread.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
